title: Task 1: Accurately describes ONE visual characteristic of the layout of the architectural complex shown.
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. Each point is earned independently.
descriptions: Response does NOT accurately describe a visual characteristic of the Great Pyramids of Giza
